comment: Extremely sarcastic and full of her self. Agree with her and youll be fine. Disagree then good luck listening to her go off. Theres a couple of these kinds of instructors in the department. Avoid them if you can.

Dr. Carte definitely makes you work for it, but she's overall a very enjoyable professor.  Funny and personable and it's pretty easy to get her off track!  Definitely knows her stuff when it comes to IT but sometimes forgets that she's basically speaking a foreign language to the rest of us (um hello- layman's terms please!!).
Dull class and the instructor is a bore. Rambles a lot about stuff that is not important. Slow with email. Canceled some classes as well thats good.

Class was moderately difficult because it is boring, dry content. There are two exams, and if you get less than a 70% average between them, you fail.  Additionally, the group project is a pain if your group is unorganized. She doesn't take attendance, but has mandatory participation points to encourage interaction in class. Bad class, okay prof.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS
